mapper.update:
update calendar
CAL_TIME=#{calTime},
END_TIME=#{endTime},
CAL_TYPE=#{calType},
CAL_LEVEL=#{calLevel},
CONTENT=#{content},
OWNER=#{owner},
TAKER=#{taker},
OVER_STATUS=#{overStatus},
BEFORE_REMAIND=#{beforeRemaind}
where CAL_ID=#{calId}
mapper.select: select CAL_ID,CAL_LEVEL,CAL_TIME,END_TIME,CONTENT from calendar where USER_ID=#{userId}

SELECT d.DEPT_ID, d.DEPT_NAME, d.DEPT_FUNC, u.UID, u.USER_ID, u.USER_NAME, u.BYNAME, u.DEPT_ID, c.* FROM department AS d, `user` AS u, calendar AS c WHERE d.DEPT_ID = u.DEPT_ID AND u.USER_ID = c.USER_ID AND d.DEPT_ID=#{deptId}

select CAL_ID,USER_ID,CAL_LEVEL,CAL_TIME,END_TIME,CONTENT from calendar where USER_ID=#{userId} and (CAL_TIME>=#{calTime} and CAL_TIME<=#{calTime}+86400) or (#{calTime}>=CAL_TIME and #{calTime}<=END_TIME)

select CAL_ID,CAL_TYPE,CAL_LEVEL,CAL_TIME,END_TIME,CONTENT,TAKER,OWNER,USER_ID from calendar where ( ( USER_ID=#{userId} and OVER_STATUS!='1' ) or ( USER_ID!=#{userId} AND ( (TAKER LIKE concat('%,', #{userId}, ',%') OR TAKER LIKE concat(#{userId}, ',%')) OR (OWNER LIKE concat('%,', #{userId}, ',%') OR OWNER LIKE concat(#{userId}, ',%')) ) ) ) and ( (CAL_TIME<=#{starTime} and END_TIME>=#{starTime}) or (CAL_TIME<=#{endTime} or END_TIME>=#{endTime}) OR (CAL_TIME>=#{starTime} or END_TIME<=#{endTime}) )
mapper.insert: insert into calendar (CAL_ID, USER_ID, CAL_TIME, END_TIME, CAL_TYPE, CAL_LEVEL, MANAGER_ID, OVER_STATUS, BEFORE_REMAIND, ADD_TIME, ALLDAY, FROM_MODULE, URL, M_ID, res_id, CONTENT, OWNER, TAKER) values (#{calId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{calTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{endTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{calType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{calLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{managerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{overStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beforeRemaind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{allday,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{fromModule,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{owner,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{taker,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

select CALENDAR_CAL_ID_SEQ.nextval as calId from dual

CAL_ID,
USER_ID,

mapper.select: select * from calendar where USER_ID=#{userId} and OVER_STATUS !='1' AND ( (#{startTime} <= CAL_TIME and CAL_TIME <= #{endTime}) OR (#{startTime} <= END_TIME and END_TIME <= #{endTime}) )

select * from calendar where USER_ID!=#{userId} AND ( (TAKER LIKE (concat('%,', #{userId}),',%') OR TAKER LIKE concat(#{userId}, ',%')) OR (OWNER LIKE (concat('%,', #{userId}),',%') OR OWNER LIKE concat(#{userId}, ',%')) ) AND ( (#{startTime} <= CAL_TIME and CAL_TIME <= #{endTime}) OR (#{startTime} <= END_TIME and END_TIME <= #{endTime}) )

select * from calendar where USER_ID!=#{userId} AND ( (TAKER LIKE concat(concat('%,', #{userId}),',%') OR TAKER LIKE concat(#{userId}, ',%')) OR (OWNER LIKE concat(concat('%,', #{userId}),',%') OR OWNER LIKE concat(#{userId}, ',%')) ) AND ( (#{startTime} <= CAL_TIME and CAL_TIME <= #{endTime}) OR (#{startTime} <= END_TIME and END_TIME <= #{endTime}) )

select * from calendar where USER_ID!=#{userId} AND ( (TAKER LIKE concat('%,', #{userId}, ',%') OR TAKER LIKE concat(#{userId}, ',%')) OR (OWNER LIKE concat('%,', #{userId}, ',%') OR OWNER LIKE concat(#{userId}, ',%')) ) AND (CAL_TIME <=#{calTime} AND #{calTime} <=END_TIME)
select * from calendar where USER_ID=#{userId} AND (CAL_TIME <=#{calTime} and #{calTime} <=END_TIME)
select * from calendar where USER_ID=#{userId} and OVER_STATUS!='1'
select * from calendar where USER_ID=#{userId} and (OVER_STATUS!='1' or OVER_STATUS IS NULL)
select * from calendar where USER_ID=#{userId} and (OVER_STATUS!='1' or OVER_STATUS IS NULL)

select * from calendar where USER_ID!=#{userId} AND ( (TAKER LIKE concat('%,', #{userId}, ',%') OR TAKER LIKE concat(#{userId}, ',%')) OR (OWNER LIKE concat('%,', #{userId}, ',%') OR OWNER LIKE concat(#{userId}, ',%')) )

select * from calendar WHERE USER_ID=#{userId} AND OVER_STATUS!='1' AND CAL_TYPE='1'
select * from calendar WHERE USER_ID=#{userId} AND (OVER_STATUS!='1' or OVER_STATUS is NULL ) AND CAL_TYPE='1'
select * from calendar WHERE USER_ID=#{userId} AND (OVER_STATUS!='1' or OVER_STATUS is NULL ) AND CAL_TYPE='1'

select * from calendar WHERE USER_ID!=#{userId} AND ( (TAKER LIKE concat('%,', #{userId}, ',%') OR TAKER LIKE concat(#{userId}, ',%')) OR (OWNER LIKE concat('%,', #{userId}, ',%') OR OWNER LIKE concat(#{userId}, ',%')) ) AND CAL_TYPE='1'

select * from calendar WHERE USER_ID!=#{userId} AND ( (TAKER LIKE concat('%,',concat( #{userId}, ',%')) OR TAKER LIKE concat(#{userId}, ',%')) OR (OWNER LIKE concat('%,',concat(#{userId}, ',%')) OR OWNER LIKE concat(#{userId}, ',%')) ) AND CAL_TYPE='1'

select CAL_ID,CAL_TYPE,CAL_LEVEL,CAL_TIME,END_TIME,CONTENT,TAKER,OWNER from calendar where ( ( USER_ID=#{userId} and OVER_STATUS!='1' ) or ( USER_ID!=#{userId} AND ( (TAKER LIKE concat('%,', #{userId}, ',%') OR TAKER LIKE concat(#{userId}, ',%')) OR (OWNER LIKE concat('%,', #{userId}, ',%') OR OWNER LIKE concat(#{userId}, ',%')) ) ) ) and ( (CAL_TIME<=#{starTime} and END_TIME>=#{starTime}) or (CAL_TIME<=#{endTime} or END_TIME>=#{endTime}) OR (CAL_TIME>=#{starTime} or END_TIME<=#{endTime}) )
